On Thursday 20 January 2005 14:05, Peter Morgan wrote:
> > I'm trying to use XMLUnit to check SOAP messages. There I'm stuck
> > with the problem that most everything in such a message has a
> > namespace prefix. Now I'm looking for a way to associate namespaces
> > to prefixes in an XPath query.
>
> I end up using http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#function-local-name
> (and http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#function-namespace-uri, if
> necessary).
>
> ...
>   <nm:bob>
>     ...
>   </nm:bob>
> ...
>
> So the XPath becomes something like:
>
> //*[local-name() = 'bob']
>
> Not pretty, but it is the only mechanism that I have found for XPath.

Yes, it gets rather clumsy for longer paths. I had hoped it was somehow 
possible to set the prefix-namespace mapping.

Michael
